rows.label: bf07110100_0010
rows.name: Are your wounds healed now?

rows.label: bf07110100_0020
rows.name:
...Yes.
I'm fine now.

rows.label: bf07110100_0030
rows.name: Sincere apologies.

rows.label: bf07110100_0040
rows.name:
If I hadn't tried to destroy Heaven's Holy Grail,
they wouldn't have...

rows.label: bf07110100_0050
rows.name:
If you'd done nothing, they'd
have come for her anyway.

rows.label: bf07110100_0060
rows.name: You're not to blame, Your Majesty.

rows.label: bf07110100_0070
rows.name: It's...my fault.

rows.label: bf07110100_0080
rows.name: 500 years ago...

rows.label: bf07110100_0090
rows.name: This kingdom was about to split in two.

rows.label: bf07110100_0100
rows.name:
Some followed Adel, who sought to
live with Blades and Divine Beasts as equals.

rows.label: bf07110100_0110
rows.name:
And the anti-Adel faction that advocated rule 
by humans and sought to utilize Divine Beasts.

rows.label: bf07110100_0120
rows.name:
After Adel's death, those of 
the anti-Adel faction

rows.label: bf07110100_0130
rows.name: established the Luxuria royal family

rows.label: bf07110100_0135
rows.name:
using the Serpent's control core they obtained 
by chance...the Sanctus Chain.

rows.label: bf07110100_0140
rows.name: Claiming they were the hero Adel's descendants.

rows.label: bf07110100_0150
rows.name: Precisely.

rows.label: bf07110100_0160
rows.name:
My ancestors used Adel's name
to win over the people's hearts.

rows.label: bf07110100_0170
rows.name: [ML:undisp ]...

rows.label: bf07110100_0180
rows.name:
Eventually, to avoid interference 
from other countries, Luxuria

rows.label: bf07110100_0190
rows.name: secluded itself deep in the Cloud Sea.

rows.label: bf07110100_0200
rows.name:
While keeping the secret that they were not
of Adel's bloodline.

rows.label: bf07110100_0210
rows.name: "And the Holy See tacitly approved this.

rows.label: bf07110100_0220
rows.name: Do you know why?

rows.label: bf07110100_0230
rows.name: No.

rows.label: bf07110100_0240
rows.name:
They offered to stay silent in
exchange for a certain resource...

rows.label: bf07110100_0250
rows.name:
An annual tribute...
comprising a fixed quantity of Core Chips.

rows.label: bf07110100_0260
rows.name: [ML:undisp ]ÔºÅ

rows.label: bf07110100_0270
rows.name: There is something I want to show you all.

rows.label: bf07110100_0280
rows.name: What is it?
